description: Contains player-specific stats over the whole game.

average_shot_quality.description: The average quality score of all shots taken by the player.
average_shot_quality.title: Quality Score

average_x_coverage_percentage.description: The average percentage of court width coverage assigned to the player during rallies, based on their positioning relative to their partner. It's only relevant in doubles; not included for singles games.
average_x_coverage_percentage.title: Percentage

backhands.description: Stats about backhands. Omitted if the player did not hit any backhands.
backhands.title: Shot Stats

ball_directions.description: Categorizes ball directions across a player's shots (9 total).

down_the_line_left_count.description: A shot played from the left straight down the left sideline.
down_the_line_left_count.title: Count

down_the_line_right_count.description: A shot played from the right straight down the right sideline.
down_the_line_right_count.title: Count

down_the_middle_count.description: A shot played from the middle straight down the middle of the court.
down_the_middle_count.title: Count

left_cross_right_count.description: A shot played from the left side of the court that crosses over to the right side.
left_cross_right_count.title: Count

left_to_middle_count.description: A shot played from the left side of the court towards the middle.
left_to_middle_count.title: Count

mid_cross_left_count.description: A shot played from the middle of the court that crosses over to the left side.
mid_cross_left_count.title: Count

mid_cross_right_count.description: A shot played from the middle of the court that crosses over to the right side.
mid_cross_right_count.title: Count

right_cross_left_count.description: A shot played from the right side of the court that crosses over to the left side.
right_cross_left_count.title: Count

right_to_middle_count.description: A shot played from the right side of the court towards the middle.
right_to_middle_count.title: Count

ball_directions.title: Ball Directions

dinks.description: Stats about dink. Omitted if the player did not hit any dink.
dinks.title: Shot Stats

drives.description: Stats about drives. Omitted if the player did not hit any drives.
drives.title: Shot Stats

drops.description: Stats about drops. Omitted if the player did not hit any drops.
drops.title: Shot Stats

fifths.description: Stats about fifths. Omitted if the player did not hit any fifths.
fifths.title: Shot Stats

final_shot_count.description: The total number of final shots by the player.
final_shot_count.title: Count

forehands.description: Stats about forehands. Omitted if the player did not hit any forehands.
forehands.title: Shot Stats

fourths.description: Stats about fourths. Omitted if the player did not hit any fourths.
fourths.title: Shot Stats

ground_stroke_count.description: The total number of ground strokes by the player.
ground_stroke_count.title: Count

kitchen_area.description: Stats about shots from the kitchen or near the kitchen area. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots from the kitchen or near the kitchen area.
kitchen_area.title: Shot Stats

left_side_player.description: Stats about shots as the left-side player. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots as the left-side player.
left_side_player.title: Shot Stats

lobs.description: Stats about lobs. Omitted if the player did not hit any lobs.
lobs.title: Shot Stats

mid_court_area.description: Stats about shots from the mid-court area. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots from the mid-court area.
mid_court_area.title: Shot Stats

near_baseline_area.description: Stats about shots from near the baseline area. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots from near the baseline area.
near_baseline_area.title: Shot Stats

near_left_sideline_area.description: Stats about shots taken near the left sideline. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots taken near the left sideline.
near_left_sideline_area.title: Shot Stats

near_midline_area.description: Stats about shots taken near the middle line. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots taken near the middle line.
near_midline_area.title: Shot Stats

near_right_sideline_area.description: Stats about shots taken near the right sideline. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots taken near the right sideline.
near_right_sideline_area.title: Shot Stats

net_fault_percentage.description: The percentage of shots that hit the net out of the total attempts.
net_fault_percentage.title: Percentage

net_impact_score.description: The net impact score is a measure of the player's overall impact on the game's outcome.
net_impact_score.title: Quality Score

out_fault_percentage.description: The percentage of shots hit out of the total attempts.
out_fault_percentage.title: Percentage

passing.description: Stats about passing shots. Omitted if the player did not hit any passing shots.
passing.title: Shot Stats

poaches.description: Stats about poaches. Omitted if the player did not hit any poaches.
poaches.title: Shot Stats

resets.description: Stats about resets. Omitted if the player did not hit any resets.
resets.title: Shot Stats

returns.description: Stats about returns. Omitted if the player did not hit any returns.
returns.title: Shot Stats

right_side_player.description: Stats about shots as the right-side player. Omitted if the player did not hit any shots as the right-side player.
right_side_player.title: Shot Stats

role_stats.description: data about this player in each serving and receiving role
role_stats.title: Role Data

serves.description: Stats about serves. Omitted if the player did not hit any serves.
serves.title: Shot Stats

shot_count.description: The total number of shots by the player.
shot_count.title: Count

smashes.description: Stats about smash shots. Omitted if the player did not hit any smash shots.
smashes.title: Shot Stats

speedups.description: Stats about speedups. Omitted if the player did not hit any speedups.
speedups.title: Shot Stats

team.description: The team to which the player belongs.

team_fifths_percentage.description: The number of 5th shots taken by the player as a percentage of the total 5th shots taken by the team.
team_fifths_percentage.title: Percentage

team_fourths_percentage.description: The number of 4th shots taken by the player as a percentage of the total 4th shots taken by the team. An indicator of 3rd shot targeting.
team_fourths_percentage.title: Percentage

team_left_side_percentage.description: The percentage of time when this player was to the left of their partner.
team_left_side_percentage.title: Percentage

team_long_length_rallies_won.description: Percent of rallies won by this player's team when the rally is 11 or more shots long.
team_long_length_rallies_won.title: Percentage

team_medium_length_rallies_won.description: Percent of rallies won by this player's team when the rally is [6,10] shots long.
team_medium_length_rallies_won.title: Percentage

team_short_length_rallies_won.description: Percent of rallies won by this player's team when the rally is [1,5] shots long.
team_short_length_rallies_won.title: Percentage

team_shot_percentage.description: The percentage of total team shots taken by the player.
team_shot_percentage.title: Percentage

team_thirds_percentage.description: The number of 3rd shots taken by the player as a percentage of the total 3rd shots taken by the team.
team_thirds_percentage.title: Percentage

third_drives.description: Stats about third shot drives. Omitted if the player did not hit any third shot drives.
third_drives.title: Shot Stats

third_drops.description: Stats about third shot drops. Omitted if the player did not hit any third shot drops.
third_drops.title: Shot Stats

third_lobs.description: Stats about third shot lobs. Omitted if the player did not hit any third shot lobs.
third_lobs.title: Shot Stats

thirds.description: Stats about thirds. Omitted if the player did not hit any thirds.
thirds.title: Shot Stats

total_distance_covered.description: The number of feet each player travels between shots in all rallies combined.

volley_count.description: The total number of volleys by the player.
volley_count.title: Count

title: Player Stats
